item.description:
Indoor rocking climbing event at Metrorock Climbing Center in Everett.  For the beginners, the cost will be $30 per person including lesson and gears.  The lesson will be approximately 1.5 hour follows by free climbing. 

 

For the experienced climbers, you can skip the lesson and pay the regular admission fee.  We already have a number of advanced climbers signed up so you guys can be belayed partners. 

 

Below is the link to the rock gym.  We are required to sign a waiver to climb.  If you can sign the waiver and bring that to the event, that will greatly speed up the registration process on the day of the event. 

http://www.metrorock.com/about-us/waivers

 

If someone requires carpool, please indicate that on your registration and we will figure something out. We will have optional dinner after the event if you are interested in joining us.

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Indoor Rock Climbing (Updated Information)
